statements: SELECT * FROM music_students_progress;
SELECT student_name, instrument, progress_score FROM music_students_progress;
SELECT student_id, student_name, instrument, progress_score, performance_score FROM music_students_progress WHERE progress_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM music_students_progress WHERE instrument = 'Guitar' ORDER BY progress_score DESC;
SELECT student_name, progress_score FROM music_students_progress WHERE performance_score < 50 ORDER BY progress_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_students_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, instrument FROM music_students_progress WHERE progress_score > 80;
SELECT student_name, instrument, progress_score FROM music_students_progress WHERE instrument = 'Piano' AND performance_score < 70;
SELECT * FROM music_students_progress WHERE progress_score BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT instrument) AS num_instruments FROM music_students_progress;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, instrument FROM students;
SELECT student_id, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE instrument = 'Piano';
SELECT performance_id, piece, duration FROM performances ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE duration > '00:10:00' ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT student_name, instrument FROM students WHERE instrument LIKE '%ano';
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT student_name, piece, duration FROM students JOIN performances ON students.student_id = performances.student_id;
SELECT * FROM music_students;
SELECT student_name, instrument FROM music_students;
SELECT student_id, level FROM music_students WHERE level > 3;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE practice_hours > 10;
SELECT student_id, piece_name FROM student_performance ORDER BY date_performed DESC;
SELECT student_name, instrument, level FROM music_students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, instrument, level FROM music_students WHERE level > 3;
SELECT student_name, practice_hours, performance_rating FROM music_students JOIN student_progress ON music_students.student_id = student_progress.student_id;
SELECT student_name, piece_name, date_performed FROM music_students JOIN student_performance ON music_students.student_id = student_performance.student_id ORDER BY date_performed DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM music_students;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT student_name, student_instrument FROM students ORDER BY student_instrument ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) FROM lessons GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT performance_id, performance_date, performance_score FROM performances WHERE performance_score < 80 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_age, student_instrument FROM students WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT lesson_date, student_id, lesson_duration FROM lessons WHERE lesson_duration >= 60 ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, performance_score FROM students JOIN performances ON students.student_id = performances.student_id WHERE performance_score > 90 ORDER BY student_name ASC, performance_score DESC;

SELECT student_name, lesson_date, progress_description FROM students JOIN lessons ON students.student_id = lessons.student_id JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS lesson_count FROM lessons GROUP BY student_id HAVING lesson_count > 5 ORDER BY lesson_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, instrument FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name FROM teachers;
SELECT * FROM lessons WHERE date='2022-10-15';
SELECT student_name, progress_report FROM students JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, instrument FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, lesson_id FROM teachers INNER JOIN lessons ON teachers.teacher_id = lessons.teacher_id;
SELECT performance_id, score FROM performances WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, progress_report FROM students LEFT JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id AND date = '2022-07-01';
